::SnowCat::

She turned and looked at the others.  "OK, who's got a plan to track 
them and save our companions?" She looked at Ratchet and the others. 
She ignored the emence pain in her shoulder.  She did look to see 
that the gash was bigger than she originally thought.  She looked up 
at the others.  "Any ideas?"
